SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.rooms

Class TrapRoom

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.rooms.Room
com.tloj.game.rooms.TrapRoom
public class TrapRoom extends Room
Represents a trap room in the game. Trap rooms have a specific effect that can be triggered by a character. They also have a side effect that can be executed.

  • Field Summary
